languages.text: "Не так странно, если учесть, как Руолдо налегает на еду и амасек... но все же достаточно тонкое наблюдение, не спорю".
"Not too odd considering Ruoldo's ravenous fondness for food and amasec... but an astute observation nonetheless."
languages.original_text: "Не так странно, если учесть, как Руолдо налегает на еду и амасек... но все же достаточно тонкое наблюдение, не спорю".

traits.locale_text: "Not too odd considering Ruoldo's ravenous fondness for food and amasec... but, of course, a most subtle observation nonetheless."
"Not too odd considering Ruoldo's ravenous fondness for food and amasec... but, of course, a most subtle observation nonetheless."
"Not too odd considering Ruoldo's ravenous fondness for food and amasec... but an astute observation nonetheless."
"Not too odd considering Ruoldo's ravenous fondness for food and amasec... but an astute observation nonetheless."
"Not too odd considering Ruoldo's ravenous fondness for food and amasec... but an astute observation nonetheless."
"Not too odd considering Ruoldo's ravenous fondness for food and amasec... but an astute observation nonetheless."

languages.text: "Nicht allzu sonderbar, wenn man um Ruoldos unstillbare Gier nach Essen und Amasec weiß ... aber dennoch eine scharfsinnige Beobachtung."
languages.original_text: "Not too odd considering Ruoldo's ravenous fondness for food and amasec... but an astute observation nonetheless."

traits.locale_text: "Nicht allzu sonderbar, wenn man um Ruoldos unstillbare Gier nach Essen und Amasec weiß ... aber dennoch eine scharfsinnige Beobachtung."

languages.text: « Pas tant que ça, étant donné le goût prononcé de Ruoldo pour la nourriture et l'amasec... mais c'est tout de même une observation très perspicace. »
languages.original_text: "Not too odd considering Ruoldo's ravenous fondness for food and amasec... but an astute observation nonetheless."

traits.locale_text: « Pas tant que ça, étant donné le goût prononcé de Ruoldo pour la nourriture et l'amasec... mais c'est tout de même une observation très perspicace. »

languages.text: 「ルオルドが食べ物とアマセックに目がないことを考えれば、さほど不自然ではありませんが…それでも鋭い観察です」
languages.original_text: "Not too odd considering Ruoldo's ravenous fondness for food and amasec... but an astute observation nonetheless."

traits.locale_text: 「ルオルドが食べ物とアマセックに目がないことを考えれば、さほど不自然ではありませんが…それでも鋭い観察です」

languages.text: «No es del todo inesperado, dado el voraz apetito de Ruoldo por la comida y el amasec... pero sigue siendo una observación astuta».
languages.original_text: "Not too odd considering Ruoldo's ravenous fondness for food and amasec... but an astute observation nonetheless."

traits.locale_text: «No es del todo inesperado, dado el voraz apetito de Ruoldo por la comida y el amasec... pero sigue siendo una observación astuta».

languages.text: “考虑到罗尔多是个暴食、贪杯的人，这或许并不太奇怪……不过，你的观察依然非常敏锐。”
languages.original_text: "Not too odd considering Ruoldo's ravenous fondness for food and amasec... but an astute observation nonetheless."

traits.locale_text: “考虑到罗尔多是个暴食、贪杯的人，这或许并不太奇怪……不过，你的观察依然非常敏锐。”

languages.text: "Ruoldo'nun gırtlağına ve amaseke aşırı düşkünlüğünü düşünülürse tuhaf sayılmaz... Yine de başarılı bir gözlem."
languages.original_text: "Not too odd considering Ruoldo's ravenous fondness for food and amasec... but an astute observation nonetheless."

traits.locale_text: "Ruoldo'nun gırtlağına ve amaseke aşırı düşkünlüğünü düşünülürse tuhaf sayılmaz... Yine de başarılı bir gözlem."
